attributes.action: Build a skate park with a flood light in wallheath park
attributes.additional_details: This would be very good and healthy for our young children theres a lot of very good riders on scooters skates and skateboards but they haven't got anywhere to ride!!! This could bring great success to the children of wallheath and surrounding areas who love sports and also bring children together for more fun times, our children need more opportunities and this also keeps them active!!!
attributes.background: Build a skate park for our young children of wallheath with a lighted area for the dark nights what keep children from playing safe

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
